title: Vehicle Maintenance Analytics
subtitle: Analyzing fuel consumption, oil usage, and service patterns
description: Built a user-friendly tool that empowers vehicle owners to make informed maintenance decisions based on detailed analysis of fuel consumption, oil usage, and service patterns.

title: Petty Cash Management App
subtitle: Streamlined financial tracking for small businesses
description: Developed a streamlined petty cash reporting application that enhances financial tracking and accountability for small businesses, providing an efficient and user-friendly solution.

title: Re-design the UI and Website of Keemasan
subtitle: Enhancing user experience for Keemasan ID
description: Revitalized the Keemasan website with a modern, user-friendly redesign that enhances the user experience, ensuring a seamless and engaging online presence for PT Kebun Emas Nusantara.

title: Manage and Develop Payportal for Duithape
subtitle: Optimizing payment processes for better user experience
description: Developed and managed Duithape's payportal solution, optimizing payment processes to provide a streamlined and efficient experience for users, increasing overall satisfaction.

title: Developing Boxity from Zero to Something
subtitle: A comprehensive web-based ERP application
description: Launched Boxity, a web-based ERP application designed to streamline business operations. From core features like issue tracking to advanced modules including stock management and financial reporting, Boxity aims to empower businesses with increased efficiency and productivity.

title: Water Chemical Management App for the Australian Government
subtitle: Ensuring safety and sustainability in water resources
description: Developed a powerful water chemical management app for the Australian Government in collaboration with CRC Care and Digital Envision Pty Ltd. The app is designed to ensure safety and sustainability in water resources management.

title: Internal Solution and Website Redesign for BTSA
subtitle: Enhancing operations with user-centric solutions
description: Optimized BTSA operations with an enhanced internal app and a redesigned website, focusing on user-centric solutions for greater efficiency and improved performance.
